author: jheidema
body:
Added cfi.py file for generation of new mode

The new cfi.py file includes a fragment for cmsDriver to create
the GENSIM.py file. The added mode is Jpsi pair production according
to the DPS model. This is a mode pursued by the BPH AWG. 
[contact]: Ozlem Ozcelik Ozludil <ozlem.ozcelik@cern.ch>
The GENSIM.py has been tested with 100 events.

commit 3a5ff6c8db8dfd9c025cd8a2d41ac5ee09a5a987
Author: Joseph Heideman <jheid1205@gmail.com>
Date:   Thu Dec 8 13:45:10 2016 -0600

    Adding fragment for Double Jpsi DPS generation
title: Adding fragment for Double Jpsi DPS generation
